alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:58AM EST until February 19 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At Parker affecting Clarion and Armstrong Counties. Allegheny River At Rimer affecting Clarion and Armstrong Counties. Clarion River At Cooksburg affecting Jefferson PA, Clarion and Forest Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAC005-031-180400- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.W.0005.220217T1558Z-220219T1245Z/ /PARP1.1.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 1058 AM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Allegheny River at Parker. * WHEN...From this morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several homes on Route 268 flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 20.2 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
